channel.title: MoparClassic configuration
channel.description: I'm setting up the configuration right now, and can set it up to run of course, but I'm not sure what all the settings should be for the beta, any ideas?

item.title: MoparClassic configuration
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:13, topic:436487”]How long after updates does the server take to reset?[/quote]

build:
[scalac] Compiling 3 scala and 246 java source files to /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/MoparClassic_Beta/workspace/GameServer/bin
[javac] Compiling 246 source files to /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/MoparClassic_Beta/workspace/GameServer/bin
[javac] /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/MoparClassic_Beta/workspace/GameServer/src/org/moparscape/msc/gs/builders/MiscPacketBuilder.java:678: cannot find symbol
[javac] symbol : variable MAX_SIZE
[javac] location: class org.moparscape.msc.gs.model.Bank
[javac] s.addByte((byte) Bank.MAX_SIZE);
[javac] ^
[javac] 1 error

Edit: I commited the fix.

Read full topic

It checks for commits every 10 minutes, and if compilation was successful it should update immediately.

[code]$ ant -f Modules/DataService/MySQLReportHandler/build.xml

item.title: MoparClassic configuration
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:436487”]Ok, great.

One last question:

report-handler = org.moparscape.msc.gs.db.impl.MySQLReportHandler (You might need to compile the module and put it in the folder)

I see the ant build script for that, but it of course can’t find the required classes to compile it, how exactly is that meant to compile without copying a bunch of binaries around?[/quote]Jar the GS, and then run the build file.

Edit: Here is a compiled version.
http://up.ht/yYDVUh

Read full topic

report-handler = org.moparscape.msc.gs.db.impl.MySQLReportHandler (You might need to compile the module and put it in the folder)

I see the ant build script for that, but it of course can’t find the required classes to compile it, how exactly is that meant to compile without copying a bunch of binaries around?

item.title: MoparClassic configuration
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:3, topic:436487”]I got that set up for the LS already, is there no way to make the GS use MySQL?[/quote]For what?

Instead of XML, you’d need to do quite a bit of work and implement a new DataStore.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparClassic configuration
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I got that set up for the LS already, is there no way to make the GS use MySQL?

Read full topic

item.title: MoparClassic configuration
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

Server:
wild-stand-still-time = 0
report-handler = org.moparscape.msc.gs.db.impl.MySQLReportHandler (You might need to compile the module and put it in the folder)

LS:
storage-medium = org.moparscape.msc.ls.persistence.impl.MySQL
auth-class = org.moparscape.msc.ls.auth.impl.WebsiteAuth

Read full topic
